text: The U.S. and European nations have awakened to the reality of China's role as a rising authoritarian regime, and the implications for our free society. The CCP’s cover-up of the coronavirus outbreak from Wuhan - which has killed thousands - has accelerated our awakening. https://t.co/S51NII28R2
